chat.welcomeDescription: I'm your AI programming assistant that helps improve development workflows. I can write code, optimize performance, generate tests, analyze architecture and assist with development tasks.
chat.greeting: Hello, I'm Takumi, your AI programming assistant! How can I help you?
chat.analyzeProject: Help me analyze the code structure and architecture of this project
chat.optimizeCode: Optimize code performance and refactor this function
chat.generateTests: Generate unit test cases and test documentation
chat.askQuestions: Ask questions, edit files, or run commands
chat.beSpecific: Be specific for the best results
chat.createTakumiMd: Create TAKUMI.md files to customize your interactions with Takumi
chat.llmSupportDesc: Support for multiple LLM providers including OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, etc.
chat.fileOperationsDesc: Intelligently read, write and edit files, supporting multiple programming languages
chat.codebaseNavigationDesc: Explore and search project code, quickly locate and analyze code structure
chat.planModeDesc: Break down complex tasks into manageable steps and execute plans step by step

modes.agentDescription: For code generation, file changes, commands and other development tasks
